content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Good to meet you, Emilia. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I was thinking of a rental price of €800 per month, which, I believe, is fair considering the location and size of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €800 per month. Thank you for your offer, Mister Heine.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Great! I'm glad you agree to the price of €800 per month. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. I look forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I have a few questions. Can you tell me how long is the lease agreement?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Sure, Emilia. I was thinking of a lease agreement of one year, with the possibility of renewal for another year if both parties agree. This will give you the stability you need to plan your living arrangements and make the most out of your time in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine
